description:
Free software
* Free
* Released under GPLv3 licence
* Supported by an active community

A network
* OpenDHT protocol
* Decentralized communication
* Peer-to-peer discovery and connection

Secured
* End-to-end encryption with authentification
* Identity managed by X.509 certificates
* Based on RSA/AES/DTLS/SRTP technologies
summary: Ring is a free and universal communication platform which preserves the users' privacy and freedoms.
author: Iros Software
